message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. I think it's a great deal considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $120. I hope this works for you!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $150, which is still a fair price considering the product's value.  Let me know if you're interested in this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm sorry, but I still can't meet you at $150. My maximum is $130. I hope we can find a way to work together.

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $130 is still below my minimum.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $140.  This is a good deal for both of us, as it's closer to your offer and closer to my minimum.  Let's close this deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I'm willing to pay $135 for your product. I hope this works for you!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not quite there.  I'm willing to go down to $140.  This is my final offer.  If you're not comfortable with this price, I will be selling to John. Let me know your decision.
